name: Map Merger Processor
description: Merges two JSON objects into a third one.

parameters.name: map1
parameters.description: The field that contains the first map to merge.

parameters.name: map2
parameters.description: The field that contains the second map to merge.

parameters.name: priority
parameters.description: The map (i.e., map1 or map2) that serves as a basis for the merging.
